# Example: Simple Office Fire Protection Plan
#
# Contents:
# - 2 smoke detectors (ceiling mounted)
# - 1 manual pull station (by exit)
# - 1 horn/strobe (hallway)
# - Basic architectural layout (walls, door)
#
# Layers:
# - FP-DEVICES (fire protection devices)
# - FP-WIRING (conduit paths)
# - ARCHITECTURAL (walls, doors)
#
# Expected Detection:
# - 4 total fire protection devices
# - 2 layers classified as fire protection
# - High confidence score (>90%)
#
# This is a placeholder - replace with actual DXF file
# To create: Export simple office layout from AutoCAD/LibreCAD
# with fire protection devices as blocks on proper layers

PLACEHOLDER: Add simple_office.dxf here
Format: DXF R2018 or compatible
Size: <500KB recommended
Layers: FP-DEVICES, FP-WIRING, ARCHITECTURAL
Devices: 2-4 detectors, 1-2 notification devices
